title: Tumor-promoting enzymes USP25 and USP28: Substantial differences identified

title_detail.value: Tumor-promoting enzymes USP25 and USP28: Substantial differences identified

summary: Researchers have solved the structures of the cancer-promoting enzymes USP25 and USP28, and identified significant differences in their activities. Both enzymes promote the growth of various tumors. The results could benefit towards the development of new, low-side-effects anticancer drugs.
